    • Uses of AdventureActivity in com.uofa.adventure_app.activity

      Subclasses of AdventureActivity in com.uofa.adventure_app.activity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnnotateActivity
      This class takes in user input and processes it when the user is in the Annotate/Comment screen.
      class  BrowserActivity
      This class takes in user input and processes it when the user is in the Story Browsing screen.
      class  EditFragementActivity
      This class deals with users editing fragements.
      class  EditStoryActivity
      Allows the user to edit the title of a story and to see all of the fragements available for that story.
      class  StoryActivity<T>
      Displays the Fragements in the story so that the user can read them.
